item.description:
Improve your Castellano and meet other Spanish culture lovers for excellent conversation, good food and drinks,  and clean fun! Come to our Castellano Speakers group and make new friends while you practice speaking and improve your skills, discover new phrases, and plan vacations to various countries for you and your family with our help!   Learn cool phrases and colloquial expressions.

If you are a native speaker, you will be surprised how many countries are represented in our group.  We have an international mix that provides our meetings with the flavor of being immersed in Castellano right in your own backyard.

¡Ven y habla y disfrutelo!

﻿﻿
item.name: The MetroWest-Greater Boston Castellano Speakers Group
